sense.def:
One's intake of food, drink, or air
je količina, ki jo pojemo, popijemo ali vdihnemo, ali postopek, s katerim hrano, pijačo ali zrak dobimo v telo.

seg.quote: Nurses kept measuring her fluid intake.

sense.def:
Osebe, ki so sprejete v neko ustanovo ali organizacijo ob določenem času, imenujemo
a particular intake
.

seg.quote: ...the army's huge emergency intake of soldiers.
